title: Vietnam: The Ten Thousand Day War. - Volume 4.
creator_credit: Information Television Productions, Cinequity Funding, Ian Macleod, Ron Kelly, Paul Lang and Don North
brief_description: Siege - covers the 77-day siege of Khe Sahn and the explosion of the Tet Offensive, and how these battles intensified the anti-war sentiment in the U.S. “Frontline America” - continues the examination of American dissent, giving an overview of President Nixon’s determination to obtain peace through pressure.
